availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Columbus B. Saunders (Nicholasville, Kentucky, resident and lieutenant colonel)

body.p: Nicholasville, Kentucky, resident and lieutenant colonel. Kentucky native. Married to Mollie Saunders. Father of Letcher Saunders. Resident of Nicholasville in 1860. Served in the 57th Kentucky Militia as lieutenant colonel in February 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, Nicholasville, p. 115.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, Nicholasville, p. 75B.
KYR-0002-161-0016.
